title: Portal Stone
content:
The Portal Stone is the key feature of several locations in the game. Upon casting the spell Teleport, players are relocated to the center of a portal stone corresponding to the location they chose.

In order to gain access to a portal stone, a player must first locate it, and then click to interact with it, referred to as "activating" in the game. Once activated, players have unlimited teleports to the portal stones with no cost to cast and no cool down.


 * Hopeport Portal Stone
 * Hopeforest Central Portal Stone
 * Hopeforest North Portal Stone
 * Mine Southwest Portal Stone
 * Mine Deep Portal Stone
 * Crenopolis Outskirts Portal Stone
 * Crenopolis Market Portal Stone
